description.en:
CryptoFranc (XCHF) is an ERC-20 stablecoin issued by Swiss Crypto Tokens AG, representing a Swiss Franc denominated bond.

All XCHF are fully backed by physical CHF bank notes which are audited  by Grant Thornton Bank Audit Ltd on a monthly basis.

Currently, 12’030’000 XCHF tokens are in circulation.
